name: Add new Slack messages as rows in Google Sheets
description: Streamline your team communication by automatically logging important messages from Slack into Google Sheets. With this template, every time a new message is posted in your designated Slack channel, Make will capture the message and add it as a new row in your Google Sheets. This ensures that you have a comprehensive record of key discussions, making it easier to track decisions, action items, and important updates. Perfect for teams looking to enhance collaboration and maintain organized documentation!
